column3: School of Electronic, Electrical & Systems Engineering
column5: This Electronic and Computer Engineering Masters/MSc will develop your skills and understanding in a field that affects all aspects of business and is crucial to economic growth. Electronics is at the heart of a wide range of business and entertainment systems and is vital to the growth of the global economy.The integration of computing and communications with interactive digital media is evident in many modern innovations that are creating a revolution in business and the life of individuals. This Electronic and Computer Engineering Masters/MSc programme is designed to equip you with the knowledge and skills you need to play a leading part in the future research, development and application of these technologies.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 3-4 years part time
